attributes.action: give parents who lose a baby to miscarriage or abortion to allow them to choose what happens to the foetus' body.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women should have the choice whether to organise a funeral for their foetus themselves or use the current hospital procedures.  Many women would like a place to go and visit their dead child and remember them.  This should be for both women who have miscarriages and abortions at whatever gestation as both have these feelings.
